dashboard.label: Trellis Slot/Fruit Machine
dashboard.description: Random SVG images displayed in a trellis layout

search.query: | makeresults count=4 | streamstats count | eval name = CASE (count==1, "Reel 1", count==2, "Reel 2", count==3, "Reel 3", count==4, "Reel 4") | eval count = random()%3 | stats sum(count) as count by name | `svg_viz_queen` | eval queen = svg_viz | `svg_viz_turtle` | eval turtle = svg_viz | `svg_viz_svg_logo` | eval svg_logo = svg_viz | eval svg_viz = CASE( count == 0, queen, count==1, turtle, 1==1, svg_logo ) | fields - queen, turtle, svg_logo
